subject: Junit testing applications built with tdk
msgSnippet: Hi, I have built a set of screens using tdk for maintaining a database. Tdk has generated the OM files for each of the tables, which i have modified later, for
messageBody:
Hi,
I have built a set of screens using tdk for maintaining a
database. Tdk has generated the OM files for each of the tables,
which i have modified later, for my requirement.
The problem now is, that I am unable to do junit testing for
these OM classes. I have used the following code for one
table :skill. When i compile using ant compile it compiles fine but
at execution time I get a "NoClassDefFound" error for
org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig. I have included the code
below. If someone could please help me, I would be very grateful.

Thanks,


package org.mycompany.newapp.tests;

import org.apache.turbine.util.db.Criteria;
import org.mycompany.newapp.om.Skill;
import org.mycompany.newapp.om.SkillPeer;

import junit.framework.Test;
import junit.framework.TestCase;
import junit.framework.TestSuite;

import org.apache.turbine.util.TurbineConfig;
import org.apache.turbine.util.RunData;
import org.apache.turbine.services.TurbineServices;

import org.apache.turbine.services.rundata.*;
import org.apache.velocity.context.Context;
import org.apache.velocity.VelocityContext;

import org.apache.turbine.util.db.*;

import java.util.*;

/**
* This file is the JUnit test for the Skill module
* @author Neetu Ganapathy
*/


public class SkillTest extends TestCase
{
private TurbineConfig config;
private RunData runData;
private Context context;
public static String WEB_DIR ="d:/tdk/webapps/newapp";
public static String CONFIG_FILE ="WEB-
INF/conf/TurbineResources.properties";

public SkillTest(String name)
{
super(name);
}

/**
* Defines the collection of all tests to run.
*/

public static Test suite()
{
return new TestSuite(SkillTest.class);
}

/**
* Run all the tests
*/

public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception
{
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}


protected void setUp()
{
config = new TurbineConfig(WEB_DIR, CONFIG_FILE);
config.init();

//Create a RunData object to pass to doPerform
this.runData = new DefaultTurbineRunData();

//Get a Context object to pass to doPerform
this.context = new VelocityContext();

}

protected void tearDown()
{
TurbineServices.getInstance().shutdownServices();
}

//-------------------------Start Of Tests-----------------------

/**
* Test insert of the records.
*/
public void testInsert()
{

Skill skill = new Skill();

try
{
skill.setName("EJB");
skill.setDescription("Enterprice Java Beans");

skill.save();

Criteria criteria = new Criteria();
criteria.add(SkillPeer.SKILLKEY, skill.getSkillkey());
skill = (Skill) SkillPeer.doSelect(criteria).elementAt
(0);

assertEquals("Skill Name","EJB",skill.getName());
assertEquals("Skill Description","Enterprice Java
Beans",skill.getDescription());
}
catch(Exception e)
{
fail("Error :" + e.getMessage());
}
}

/**
* Test update of the records.
*/
public void testUpdate()
{
Skill skill = new Skill();

try
{
skill.setSkillkey("1");
skill.setName("J2EE");
skill.setDescription("Java 2 Enterprice Edition");
skill.setModified(true);
skill.setNew(false);
skill.save();

Criteria criteria = new Criteria();
criteria.add(SkillPeer.SKILLKEY, skill.getSkillkey());
skill = (Skill) SkillPeer.doSelect(criteria).elementAt
(0);

assertEquals("Skill Name","J2EE",skill.getName());
assertEquals("Skill Description","Java 2 Enterprice
Edition",skill.getDescription());
}
catch(Exception e)
{
fail("Error :" + e.getMessage());
}
}

public void testDoSelect()
{
Vector vector = null;
try
{
vector = SkillPeer.doSelect(new Criteria());
}
catch (Exception ex)
{

}
int result = (vector.size() > 0? 1 : 0);
assertEquals("Result",1,result);
assertNotNull(vector);
}
}
